forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
Downtown San Francisco greets the afternoon with gentle warmth, the sun casting a soft light that dances playfully over the cityscape. As the day unfolds, a high near 67 offers a reprieve from the chill that often whispers through the coastal streets, though temperatures are set to dip slightly, settling around 65 as the afternoon draws to a close. The west wind, a familiar companion, rustles through the buildings at about 15 mph, occasionally invigorated by gusts reaching 22 mph. 

Tonight, a hint of possible drizzle will weave its way into the evening, accompanied by a tapestry of clouds that will roll over the skyline as the temperature gracefully descends to a mild 58. With the chances of precipitation at a modest 20%, you may wish to keep an eye on the sky. The hint of fog or marine layer will likely creep in later, obscuring the views and lending an ethereal quality to the night. For today's adventures, dress in layers—a light sweater may serve you well as the breeze picks up. It would be a lovely time to wander through the city’s vibrant neighborhoods, perhaps stopping for a quiet moment in a café, where the clinking of cups complements the tranquil pulse of life around you. Allow the charms of the late afternoon to unfold; there’s beauty to be found in both light and shadow, a serene reminder of the city’s unique character.
